marklogic.body:
In response to Hayden's blatant Zuko/Katara shipping (gentle ribbing), I'll out myself as a shipper, and an Aang/Katara one at that.
The reason contains SPOILERS.
Zuko and Katara are a little too similar; both of them have very intense tempers, and are quick to jump to conclusions a little too quickly. Think of how quickly Zuko enabled Katara's desire to MURDER her mother's killer. Aang knew right away that it was neither what Katara really wanted or needed.
I see Zuko and Katara as representing the typical teenage romance, built on intensity and chemistry, but ultimately one that would Burn them both. I thought Mei was a better force in Zuko's emotional life, and Aang to Katara's... both Mei and Aang served as a balance point, a calm perspective.Â
But that's also probably me reading into the situation. I was not wild about how the creators handled Katara and Aang up until the finale. I kind of wish they'd left Off the shipping until the characters were older, and Katara had Burned out on her "bad boy" thing.Â
